findings.title: Revisited Cliff Consideration in _computeReleasableAmount()
findings.description: The `_computeReleasableAmount()` function does not consider the cliff period or release initial amounts before the cliff.

findings.title: Improved Revoke Logic in RowaVesting
findings.description: The current revoke logic in RowaVesting contract can be improved by removing redundant code logic for non-revocable vesting schedules.

findings.title: Trust Issue Of Admin Keys
findings.description: In the RowaVesting implementation, there is a privileged accounts, i.e., owner. This account plays a critical role in governing and regulating the system-wide operations.
